unnormalised: Guys, before investing in the stock market, remember to do your research. Check the company's financials, like their EPS and P/E ratio. Don't just blindly follow tips. Also, understand different investment options like MFs and SIPs. Consult a financial advisor if needed, especially if you are new to investing. Remember, past performance isn't always indicative of future returns. Good luck!
normalised: Guys, before investing in the stock market, remember to do your research. Check the company's financials, like their E-P-S and P-E ratio. Don't just blindly follow tips. Also, understand different investment options like M-F-s and S-I-P-s. Consult a financial advisor if needed, especially if you are new to investing. Remember, past performance isn't always indicative of future returns. Good luck!
